projects.name: Mandelbrot
projects.text: A Mandelbrot renderer I made for a university course written in C#. It has multithreading, multiple color modes, and the ability to export and import renders as .mandel files, which is a file format specially created for this project.

projects.name: AulaControl
projects.text: This project aimed to control the aula at my old high school using a USB to DMX converter written in Kotlin. It played music and controlled the lights during lunchtime.

projects.name: Advent Of Code
projects.text: All of my current advent of code solutions, written in Kotlin. Some of the worst code I've written, yet I learn a lot from it.

projects.name: NixOS Config
projects.text: The configurations for my NixOS machines. It includes configuration for all my apps, window managers, network, timezones, and more. It's also modularized so that adding a new machine with unique property is a breeze.
